Text:
both quicktime and divx player did not recognize this file as a video format (no matter what extension I put on it). but for some reason toast was able to recognize it then convert it to divx... 

worked fine after that.
uau5: it worked fine before that, you probably did not have the proper codecs, do a fucking google search before u call something "bs"
I also had trouble opening the file up in quicktime and with WMV with the proper codec. VLC worked great tho, as always.
I also really like this movie, thanks for uploading. Shows the positive as well as negative aspects of deadhead culture.

download and install this and you will be able to watch any movie on the pirate bay
